ground_truth_answer: AI la linh vuc khoa hoc may tinh nghien cuu ve viec tao ra cac he thong thong minh

query: Ung dung cua AI bao gom nhung gi?
ground_truth_answer: nhan dien giong noi, xu ly ngon ngu tu nhien, thi giac may tinh va robot tu dong
Machine Learning la mot nhanh cua tri tue nhan tao cho phep may tinh hoc tu du lieu

query: Cac phuong phap ML bao gom gi?
ground_truth_answer: supervised learning, unsupervised learning va reinforcement learning
mang neural nhan tao nhieu tang

query: Deep Learning hieu qua trong linh vuc nao?
ground_truth_answer: xu ly hinh anh, am thanh va ngon ngu tu nhien
xu ly hinh anh va computer vision
NLP la linh vuc xu ly ngon ngu tu nhien giup may tinh hieu va tao ra ngon ngu cua con nguoi
dich may, trich xuat thong tin, phan tich cam xuc va chatbot
Transformer la kien truc hien dai nhat cho NLP
Computer Vision la linh vuc thi giac may tinh cho phep may tinh hieu va phan tich hinh anh va video

query: Xe tu lai dung cong nghe gi?
RNN dung cho loai du lieu nao?
Kien truc nao pho bien cho hinh anh?

ground_truth_answer: hoc, suy luan, va tu cai thien theo thoi gian
